name: Opentracker Analytics
author: Opentracker

sections.description:
Opentracker is a competitively priced best-of-breed solution for website & mobile app analytics, website Lead gathering and other big-data traffic reporting. Our goal is to provide the best, most informative, and most straight-forward analytics solution available.

Features include:

  • Search all visitor data
  • Know who’s on your website in real-time
  • Visitor and user tagging
  • Company Identification
  • Much more
sections.installation:
To install the plugin, either add the plug-in via your WordPress admin plugin section, upload the .zip file using the plugin installer, or SFTP the files over to your wp-content/plugins/ directory and activate it.

Configuration Options
To make the plugin work correctly, you need to enter your registered site name. you can set this setting under the Settings -> Opentracker page
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

To install the plugin, either add the plug-in via your WordPress admin plugin section, upload the .zip file using the plugin installer, or SFTP the files over to your wp-content/plugins/ directory and activate it.

Configuration Options
To make the plugin work correctly, you need to enter your registered site name. you can set this setting under the Settings -> Opentracker page

Do i need an Opentracker (trial) account to use this plugin

yes

Will this track every page on my WordPress website?

Yes, all pages except the admin pages.
sections.changelog:
1.3

1.2

  • fixed incorrect link to settings page

1.1

  • Improved link to the Opentracker settings page for WordPress installations not in root directory.
  • Added banner images.
  • Added icon/logo

1.0

  • Initial releaase

short_description: This plugin can be used to add the Opentracker tracking code to a Wordpress site
